meanings.definition: The point in time or space at which something starts.
meanings.sent1: At the beginning of the movie, the hero saves the day.
meanings.sent2: The beginning of a race is always exciting.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the beginning of playtime was the perfect time to pounce on a toy.
meanings.sent4: In the beginning of a friendship, trust is like a fragile seed just planted.
meanings.sent5: The beginning of a journey is filled with anticipation and wonder.

meanings.definition: The first part or section of something.
meanings.sent1: The beginning of the book introduces the main characters.
meanings.sent2: In a recipe, the beginning often involves gathering ingredients.
meanings.sent3: The beginning of the song had everyone tapping their feet.
meanings.sent4: The beginning of a puzzle is where you find the corner pieces.
meanings.sent5: The beginning of a marathon is crucial for pacing oneself.

meanings.sent1: Her beginning of the project was marked by careful planning.
meanings.sent2: The beginning of a speech sets the tone for the rest.
meanings.sent3: The beginning of a game is when strategies are put to the test.
meanings.sent4: In gardening, the beginning of planting seeds is full of hope.
meanings.sent5: The beginning of a dance performance is like a burst of energy on stage.
